climbs.name: Three Rings for the Elven Kings

content.description: A fantastically aesthetic line with a quick crux at about 15 feet and solid, wonderful to place PRO in the made to order crack that you will wish went on forever.  The face above is also very fun and mildly runout, but it won't matter 'cuz you'll be flyin' from the experience!  A must do!
content.protection: One set of nuts, 0.5-2 Camalots, medium Aliens or similar.  I believe a total of four bolts take you through the upper face to the top.

content.description: Erebor is NW, downhill, and then W from Riddle.  There are three routes that I know of on this rock.  A 12+ project that may be unfinished, Three Rings for Elven Kings and Misguided Youth, which shares the start with 3 rings.  Instead of going right at the pod, go left, run it out for around 100 feet and hook up with the bolts at the top of 3 Rings.  This route is 5.8, vs.
